item.title: [WIP] Essay: VAE is a 1-step Diffusion Model
item.description: 아래 글은 비공식적인 개인의 사견임을 밝힌다. Essay on VAE and its relationship to diffusion model Keyword: VAE, Diffusion Model, VDM, VLB Introduction

item.title: Variational Diffusion Models
item.description: Variational Diffusion Models, Kingma et al., 2021, arXiv:2107.00630 Keyword: DDPM, Variational Lower Bounds Problem: Unstable noise scheduling, finite step diffusion process.

item.title: ANF, VFlow

item.title: Glow, Flow++

item.title: Normalizing Flow, Real NVP
item.description: Variational Inference with Normalizing Flows, Rezende and Mohamed, 2015, arXiv Density Estimation using Real NVP, Dinh et al.

item.title: Attentive Neural Processes
item.description: Hyunjik kim et al., 2019, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Underfitting of Neural Process Solution: NP + Self-Attention, Cross-Attention Benefits: Improvement of prediction accuracy, training speed, model capability.

item.title: Neural Processes
item.description: Marta Garnelo et al., 2018, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Data inefficiency, hard to train multiple datasets in one.

item.title: Conditional Neural Processes
item.description: Marta Garnelo et al., 2018, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Weakness of knowledge sharing and data inefficiency of classical supervised learning Solution: Stochastic Process + NN Benefits: Data efficient, prior sharing Contribution: Encapsulation of parameterized NN function family.
